2 reviews If I could give zero stars, I would! This GP is so shameless, that they have now even time-limited sending admin requests and sick notes as well. Just like the appointments. They are open from 8am to hardly 10am or 11am. Who makes them think that we are available during those times when someone is sick or at work or commuting?? Instead of making it easy for sick patients to book appointments and requests at their convenience, they stress you out more, make you more anxious and sick. Horrible management! In Liverpool and London, almost all GPs have open appointment systems, you can book appointments online and choose your date and time. Admin requests, medical reports and sick notes are processed within 48 hours no questions asked and they even deliver medication to your house! But look at these guys, they are operating on biblical systems and it is 2025!! Do yourselves a favour and please open up your booking systems. Its not that hard. Stop being so shameless! I will be reporting this GP to Health Ombudsman, NHS and MP. ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè7

I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with the service provided by this practice. The level of care and professionalism is shockingly poor, and I‚Äôm genuinely appalled by the way patients are treated. The staff are not only unhelpful but often rude and dismissive, making it incredibly difficult to get even the most basic appointment advice or simply book one. Trying to book an appointment is an absolute nightmare. Instead of making things easier for unwell patients, the process adds stress, anxiety, and frustration. You‚Äôre passed between phone lines, broken websites, and conflicting instructions; and still end up with no appointment. It feels like no one takes responsibility, and the entire system is set up to discourage people from accessing care. Terrible experience, awful management. This practice desperately needs a complete overhaul. ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè3

We always strive to provide the highest level of care and service to patients and are disappointed to hear that you have not received that. I would really like to take a look into the incident you described in your review. if you would like me to investigate further, please do fill out a feedback form here: https://bit.ly/3rDHr8A. reviews.text: ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè2

Thank you for your review, I‚Äôm saddened to hear that you feel we‚Äôre the worst doctors in Longsight and that our staff don‚Äôt care at all. Please let me reassure you that is not the case, and although you may not see it, our team constantly go above and beyond behind the scenes to try and make improvements for patients. This includes extending opening hours at a sister site so more patients are able to be seen each day, introducing new services like a full wellbeing team, physio team and in-house pharmacists that most practices don‚Äôt have, and having a same day service so patients don‚Äôt have to wait weeks to be seen. It's a shame you have decided to leave our practice, but I am glad that you feel you‚Äôre getting better care elsewhere. Kind Regards, Lauren, Engagement & Communications Officer
